name: Bike Rider DX
description:
After being crowned as No.1 download title in Japan twice, this new kind of jump 'n run action finally made its way across the ocean. Travel the globe to be the champion of the WORLD TOUR, or break the high score in the endless GRAND PRIX mode in this crazy sidescrolling platformer!

Simple controls, more than 60 levels and an addicting endless mode guarantee endless bike-riding fun!
